tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: She's excellent with the kids. Explains to the kid patiently of her treatment plan. As parents we are thoroughly satisfied with her suggestions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Instantaneous resolution to the dental problems . Expertise tretment. No much wait time. Friendly atmosphere.Good counselling

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We managed to treat our 2 year olds cavity , followed by a flouride treatment.  
It was super challenging to treat such a young child who wouldn't sit to even show her teeth.  But Dr.Shilpa dealed with utmost patience and care.
She is a great doctor with experience . Highly recommended for kids with teeth problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I used to wonder why & how  a paediatric dentist is different from regular dentist. Meet Dr.Shilpa Naik and you will know. My 5 year old now runs to the dentist chair and sits with his mouth open. I was amazed. She also shares a lot of insights on overall kid’s  health. There can also be speech development implications, depending on which milk tooth falls off. Never knew. Highly recommend Dr. Shilpa Naik.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Siddharth 

Extremely professional and warm 
Explains the issue well 
Takes the patient into confidence 
Has a good hand while doing the treatment 
Values time and cost for patient
His staff is friendly and helpful 
Music and ambience make it an effortless experience
Highly recommend him

review: It was my second visit.. first I had with husband of Dr. Shilpa Naik and second for my daughter with Dr. Shilpa Naik. Both doctors are good and made us understand the issue and treated it effectively.
